path: Referenced Material/PDF Library/Vendor/Evertz/Evertz Bulletins/Production Systems Engineering Bulletin- FTX & TSR Legacy Routers OOS- 2-5-21 v1.pdf
text: Production Systems Engineering Bulletin- FTX & TSR Legacy Routers OOS- 2/5 Friday- 2/5/21 This evening we shutdown and removed from service the legacy FTX Router and TSR Sub Router on the 2 nd Floor. These routers are no longer needed since SatOps/TOC workflows were moved to the ACQ-EXE. During the shutdowns, we worked alongside MTC to make sure none of their services or workflows were impacted. We donâ€™t expect there to be any reason that we would need to power them back up, but please reach out if you get any odd related reports. Thanks! Trevor Bascomb NBCUniversal Manager, Production Systems Engineering
